dublin_core.dcvalue: Research has focused on improvement of the quality of life of stroke patients Gait detection kinematics and kinetics analysis home based rehabilitation and telerehabilitation are the areas where there has been increasing research interest The paper reviews position sensing technologies and their application for human movement tracking and stroke rehabilitation The review suggests that it is feasible to build a home based telerehabilitation system for sensing and tracking the motion of stroke patients
Medical And biological engineering And computing
Position-sensing technologies for movement analysis in stroke rehabilitation.
